Title: MetroMVVM
Description: MetroMVVM is a .NET helper library for Windows 8 Metro style XAML applications. It contains a set of basic components, helpers, extensions to easily develop apps based on the Model-View-ViewModel pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

MetroMVVM is a .NET helper library for Windows 8 Metro style XAML applications. It contains a set of basic components, helpers, extensions to easily develop apps based on the Model-View-ViewModel pattern.

Get started

More information about MetroMVVM can be found on http://gianni.rosagallina.com.
